attributes.action: Please Protect Young Adults with Special Needs from discrimination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People with special needs; need fast tracking in the systems not stigmatisation or institutionalisation; this is creating victims in our tolerant society. Most special needs people only fail due to lack of adequate early interventions so how can we penalise an individual for a corrective responsibility? Which is a greater crime, their lack of social learnt behaviour or societal discrimination of their disabilities? 
Please give us your vote for this petition, stop prejudiced treatment for people living with Behaviour Disorders, unlike other ailments they are sometimes less obvious to the next person and are quite high maintenance. Special needs people need support not incarceration.
